original_text: There were six big pots there. People had used stone to make them. Each pot could contain about 100 litres of water. The water was there so that the Jews could wash themselves in the way that their special rules taught.
korean_text: 거기에 유대인의 정결 예식을 따라 두세 통 드는 돌항아리 여섯이 놓였는지라

sentences.original_text: There were six big pots there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 큰 돌항아리 여섯 개가 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: People had used stone to make them.
Each pot could contain about 100 litres of water.
sentences.korean_translation: 각 항아리는 약 100리터의 물을 담을 수 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: so that the Jews could wash themselves
in the way that their special rules taught.
